title: Harmony
description: see the machinery that provides air, electrical power, water, and other essential systems.

title: Kibo
description: feel the space of the largest ISS module. You look over the two experiment sections and don't see anything out of place at first glance.

title: Columbus
description: are  careful not to disrupt the Europoean Space Agency experiments.

title: Destiny
description: check the ISS control systems and make sure that the status indicators are green.

title: Unity
description: wonder how many people have floated through here since it first launched in 1998.

title: Tranquility
description: look at the treadmil, dreading your next zero-g workout.

title: Quest
description: double check the integrity of each of the airlocks and spacesuits.

title: Zarya Cargo
description: look through each of the storage racks for clues.

title: Zvezda
description: wonder if any of the Russian cosmonauts would object to your inspection.

title: Nauka Multipurpose Laboratory
description: keep thinking that you're not quite comfortable with some of the experiments hapening in here.

title: Rassvet Docking
description: remember that the next Soyuz crew transport is scheduled to dock right there in just two months.
